name: Bonobo's Foods
text:
VEGGIE BURGERS Served on fresh whole wheat buns from Donato's Bakery
1. PICK A PATTY V
100% Plant-based
SEED
WILD RICE NUT
CHICK BEAN NUT
APPLE MUSTARD CHICK'N
BEYOND MEAT
2. PICK A STYLE
BONOBO V 10$ House made garlic aioli, ketchup, onion, pickle, tomato, and field greens
MUSHROOM MELT 11$ House made garlic aioli, crimini mushrooms, Thunder Oak gouda, tomato, and field greens
BARBECUE V 11$ House made garlic aioli, fried onion slivers, house barbecue sauce, tomato, and field greens
3. UPGRADE YOUR BURGER
GOUDA/DAIYA CHEESE 2$
AVOCADO 2$
ONION SLIVERS 1$
SMOKY MAPLE TEMPEH 2$
SAUTÉED MUSHROOMS 1$
CRISPY BREADED JALAPEÑOS 2$
4. ADD A SIDE
SALAD 6$
FRIES 5$
POUTINE 10$
V - Already Vegan Substitute gouda with vegan cheese to make the entire menu vegan. GLUTEN FREE BUN 1$
AVOCADO PESTO TOAST V 8$ Donato's whole wheat bread with avocado, house-made pesto, seed mix, hemp hearts and sprouts
CASHEW CREAM VEG. SOUP V 11$ With pesto toast
CORN DOGS V 12$ 2 corn dogs with your choice of dip
FISH TACOS V 15$ Three tacos on corn tortillas with greens, creamy coleslaw, mango salsa, chipotle aioli and ''fish''
T.L.T. BURGER V 10$ House-made garlic aioli, smoky maple bacon tempeh, tomato, and field greens
MANGO CHICK'N BURGER V 11$ Apple mustard chick'n patty, maple BBQ sauce, coleslaw, and mango
BBQ CHICK'N BURGER V 10$ House-made garlic aioli, breaded chick'n, maple BBQ sauce, tomato, and field greens
VEGAN MAC BURGER V 11$ Beyond Meat patties, house mac sauce, diced onions, shredded lettuce, pickles, and vegan cheddar
LOADED MAC FRIES V 12$ / 16$ Diced onions & pickles, mac sauce, shredded lettuce, and chopped Beyond Meat patty with vegan cheddar on a bed of fries
SALADS
ADD: avocado 2$, almond pesto 4$, grilled seitan chick'n 4$
SWEET V 14$ Strawberry, mango, kiwi, fresh sprouts, sunflower/pumpkin seeds, hemp hearts, coconut, almonds, cashews. With house poppy seed dressing
SAVOURY 14$ Snap peas, fresh sprouts, cherry tomatoes, tofu, sunflower/pumpkin seeds, hemp hearts, almonds, cashews, gouda. With house sun-dried tomato dressing
MEDITERRANEAN 14$ Olives, fresh sprouts, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, snap peas, red onion, almonds, cashews, gouda. With house creamy cashew dill dressing
APPETIZERS
MAC & CHZ CASHEW BITES V 12$ With garlic aioli
CAULIFLOWER PAKORAS V 12$ With sweet chili sauce
FRIES V 5$ / 7$ Garlic / chipotle aioli or house-made gravy
POUTINE 10$ / 13$ Gouda curds topped with house-made gravy
SPICY POUTINE 12$ / 15$ Our poutine with chipotle gravy, crispy onion slivers and heartbeat Hot Sauce
FOR KIDS
GRILLED CHEESE 7$ Donato's whole wheat bread with gouda
CRISPY TENDERS & FRIES V 10$ Gardein Chick'n fingers & fries with a choice of dip
DESSERT
Dine in only
DEEP FRIED BANANA 10$ With CASHEW ICE CREAM V Banana, deep fried, served with cashew ice cream and drizzled with local maple syrup
All prices & ingredients are subject to change.
